title: e-SPGA App
descriptions: e-SPGA System is developed to fulfill the requirements of Angkatan Koperasi Kebangsaan Malaysia Berhad (ANGKASA) and to move e-SPGA from legacy proprietary platform to newer system architecture and infrastructure for better user experience and future expansion purposes

title: Wiber.id
descriptions: Aplikasi tiket berbasis web dikembangkan untuk memfasilitasi pengelolaan permintaan layanan secara efisien dan terstruktur.

title: READS
descriptions: A Drilling Application is a specialized digital solution designed to streamline, monitor, and manage drilling operations efficiently.
